general_advisory: Harvesting of summer rice and post harvesting operations of rabi crops are ongoing. Intercultural operations and top dressing of summer non-paddy crops are being carried out. Plant protection measures for various flowers are also in progress. Ensure clean water and adequate grazing time for cattle.

advisory: Use certified seeds for paddy cultivation.
Perform germination test before sowing seeds.
Use recommended seed rates for different varieties of arhar.
Perform proper seed treatment with recommended products.
Uproot and dispose of infected plants with grassy shoot disease.
Spray appropriate insecticides to manage Aphids.
Spray Cypermethrin to manage pod borer infestation.
Identify and manage mite infestation in chilli crops.
Spray recommended insecticides for mite control.
Select suitable varieties of brinjal for cultivation.
Prepare nursery beds properly for brinjal crops.
